article.title: Testing mixing HTML and Markdown
article.content:
Markdown links, <img>s, and container elements

Often there's images inside links. Need to make sure the new method for resizing images works in this situation.

✅ Works: Image inside a Markdown link, single line:

<div> containers

🤷 Partial: <div> inside a Markdown link, single line:
- Somehow the nesting order ends up being reversed??
- <a> ends up inside the <div>

hey

🤷 Partial: <img> inside a <div> inside a Markdown link, single line:
- Somehow the <div> ends up as the parent then the <a>, then the <img>(!)
- As long as it keeps working as intended, this might be the best way forward.
- It does yield an acceptable result: an <img> inside an <a> inside a <div>
